name: SNS000... Chapter 00
description:
You have returned, are you lost in the desert? or are you looking for something...

movement = w a s d

space = handbrake/jump

arrow keys = move through screen numbers, switch sides

interact = e

execute action/shoot/use = left mouse button

aim = right mouse button

switch item = 1/2

go back/get out = q

crouch = ctrl

enter = skip intro/choose

esc = exit game

repeatedly pressing 0 can get you out of an impossible situation...

esc = escape...

you have a limited amount of ammo that is necessary to progress in certain situations, or you'll have to restart, or find a glitch somewhere...

Warning: this is a prototype...

Special thanks to my brother Chady (chadiik)
